translation: Whatever I have presumptuously said from carelessness or love, addressing You as O Krishna! O Yadava! O Friend! regarding You merely as a friend, unknowing of Your greatness.
commentary: 11.41 Sakha friend? It is as? considering regarding? Presumptuously presumptuously? That whatever? said said? O Krishna O Krishna? O Yadava O Yadava? O friend O friend? It is thus? Unknowingly unknowing? Mahimanam greatness? Your Thy? This is this? Maya by me? pramadaat from carelessness? Pranayen due to love? or or? even even.No Commentary.
